Title: Study heroes and show action. People change thoughts, the earth changes looks
Designer: "Study and watch heroes and their behavior" Workers' Spare Time Art Creation Group ("学英雄见行动"工人业余美术创作组)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: Jiang Shuiying (江水英), heroine of the Model Opera Ode to the Dragon River (Longjiang Song, 龙江颂).
